flavor: No one knows the swamp’s dangers better than you do, because it was your task to bring news to the neighboring communities and to gather information to bring back to the elders. Your travels revealed much about the swamp’s secrets, helping you find secret paths none knew about. Why did you leave your village? Did you become lost? Was your village destroyed while you were away? Are you, perhaps, an envoy to the larger world?
name: Wayfinder
